title: Hour 1 – Brett McMurphy (07-10-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 – Brett McMurphy (07-10-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they discuss the future of college football after the BIG 10 announced they will only play conference games in 2020. College Football Insider Brett McMurphy joins the show to tell the guys if other conferences will follow what the BIG 10 is doing in 2020. They also talk about a lawsuit involving Zion Williamson and his stepfather accepting money while he was at Duke.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
